title: Delhi Police SWAT commando dies after husband hits her with dumbbell
content: A 24-year-old Delhi Police SWAT commando, Kajal Chaudhary, has died after a brutal assault by her husband, Ankur, with a dumbbell. The incident, allegedly fueled by financial disputes, occurred in their southwest Delhi home. Ankur has been arrested and faces murder charges. Kajal's family also cited dowry harassment. She is survived by a young son.

title: Homicide, fraud, gambling dens: Why did China execute 11 members of a family?
content: Eleven members of the powerful Ming family, involved in large-scale scam centers and gambling operations in Myanmar, have been executed in China. Sentenced for crimes including homicide and fraud, their downfall signifies a major outcome of China's crackdown on cross-border criminal networks. The family's operations generated billions and led to the deaths of Chinese citizens.

title: Amazon layoffs: Internal messages reveal what Amazon HR head's email 'didn't give details of'
content: Amazon has begun mass layoffs impacting 16,000 corporate employees, with internal communications revealing AWS and retail divisions bearing the brunt. Teams involved in AI cloud services, data warehousing, and Prime subscriptions are among those affected. This move aligns with CEO Andy Jassy's vision of operating like a "world's largest startup," emphasizing speed and ownership.

title: ‘Sour grapes?’ Goyal hits back at Congress for calling India-EU FTA deal 'hugely-hyped'
content: Commerce minister Piyush Goyal fiercely defended the India-EU free trade agreement, calling it a landmark win-win deal. He dismissed Congress leader Jairam Ramesh's criticisms as politically motivated and disconnected from economic realities, highlighting the pact's potential for growth and employment. Goyal emphasized proactive engagement on sensitive issues like CBAM and intellectual property.

title: Watch: Trump’s TikTok moment with his 'number one fan' Nicki Minaj
content: Singer-rapper Nicki Minaj publicly endorsed Donald Trump, appearing in a TikTok video with him and praising his leadership. She also shared an image of Trump's "Gold Card," a policy aimed at fast-tracking residency for wealthy individuals and those on work visas. Minaj expressed strong support, calling herself his "No 1 fan" and vowing to counter perceived "smear campaigns."

title: US set to strike Iran’s top brass? Tehran threatens to hit ‘heart of Tel Aviv’
content: President Trump is reportedly considering significant new strikes against Iran following stalled nuclear talks and the violent suppression of recent protests. Options discussed include targeting Iranian commanders and institutions responsible for the crackdown, aiming to embolden demonstrators and weaken the government. The US has also moved a carrier strike group closer to the region.

title: Japan's second richest man 'drops' plan to spend $50 billion on buying American company
content: Japan's second-richest man, Masayoshi Son, has reportedly halted $50 billion acquisition talks for US data center firm Switch Inc. This move impacts SoftBank's ambitious Stargate AI infrastructure plans, which aimed to power OpenAI. While a full takeover is off, discussions for a partial investment or partnership continue, as SoftBank doubles down on AI investments.

title: ‘Players upgrade… I can’t be the same’: 'Smarter' Shivam Dube sends warning to bowlers
content: Shivam Dube showcased a significant T20 evolution with a blistering 65 off 23 balls against New Zealand.  He attributed his enhanced performance to consistent opportunities, a sharper mindset, and increased comfort against pace. Dube emphasized his growth through experience, aiming to be a smarter player with each match, focusing on dominating rather than milestones.

title: FIR against Ranveer Singh for mimicking Daiva act
content: Bollywood actor Ranveer Singh faces an FIR in Bengaluru for allegedly disrespecting religious sentiments. He is accused of mimicking Rishab Shetty's 'Daiva' act from the film 'Kantara' during an event last November, with Shetty present. The actor had previously apologized after online criticism for the imitation.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 trades below 25,200; BSE Sensex plunges 500 points
content: Indian equity benchmarks Nifty50 and BSE Sensex opened lower on Thursday amid weak global cues. Despite a subdued Wall Street performance and unchanged US Federal Reserve interest rates, gold continued its record-setting run. Foreign portfolio investors were net buyers, with domestic institutional investors providing stronger support.

title: Governor of US state where Elon Musk wants all companies to move has ‘banned’ H1-B visas
content: Texas Governor Greg Abbott has halted new H-1B visa hiring across state agencies and public universities until May 2027, citing program abuse and prioritizing Texans for jobs. This directive contrasts with Elon Musk's push for professionals to relocate to Austin. The state, home to over 40,000 H-1B holders, will also audit its foreign workforce.

title: Who was the 'shadow of Ajit Pawar' killed in Baramati plane crash?
content: Vidip Jadhav, a personal security officer to Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, tragically died in an air crash alongside the politician. A 2009-batch police constable, Jadhav was known for his close association with Pawar and his calm, warm demeanor in his Vitawa neighborhood. He is survived by his parents and two children.

title: No CCTVs, no lifeguards, no alarms: Screams of Delhi's 6-year-old boy drowned in systemic failure
content: A six-year-old boy drowned at a Delhi swimming pool on June 13, 2025, due to alleged negligence and lack of basic safety measures. Six months later, his grieving family seeks justice, having moved the Delhi High Court after police filed a case against the pool owner and manager.

title: ‘I find it disrespectful’: Novak Djokovic fires back at journalist — Watch
content: Tennis legend Novak Djokovic, aiming for a record 25th Grand Slam, expressed frustration at being perceived as 'chasing' younger rivals. He emphasised his own historical dominance, stating he is creating his own legacy rather than being in pursuit. Despite an unconventional path to the semifinals, Djokovic remains a strong contender.

title: ‘Very disappointed’: Trump's aide fumes as India-EU seal 'mother of all deals'
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent expressed strong disappointment with European nations over their new trade deal with India. He criticized Europe for prioritizing trade interests over supporting Ukraine, particularly after India continued to purchase Russian oil and its refined products, which Europe then bought.

title: Baramati's unbeaten 'aamdar': Ajit 'Dada' Pawar's innings of unfinished ascent
content: Ajit Pawar, a seasoned politician known for his political acumen and resilience, navigated a career marked by significant achievements and controversies. Despite never realizing his ambition of becoming Chief Minister, he consistently held powerful positions and influenced Maharashtra's political landscape for over four decades, leaving behind a complex legacy.

title: Uttarakhand horror: 25-year-old woman offered lift, raped in moving car; two arrested
content: In Rudrapur, two men have been apprehended for allegedly raping a 25-year-old woman inside a moving car. The survivor reported being offered a ride to work, only to be driven around and assaulted before being left in a secluded spot. Police swiftly arrested both suspects and recovered the vehicle used in the crime.

title: ‘No footwork’: Gavaskar’s brutal takedown of Samson after another missed chance
content: Sanju Samson's batting woes persisted in the New Zealand T20Is, drawing sharp criticism from Sunil Gavaskar.  The former captain highlighted Samson's lack of footwork against spin, a recurring technical issue.  With scores of 10, 6, 0, and now 24, Samson faces mounting pressure to secure his spot ahead of the T20 World Cup.

title: Budget 2026: Which sectors could be in focus? Top stocks retail investors should watch
content: Higher allocations are expected for defence and allied industries, power, nuclear energy, electronics manufacturing, critical minerals and select labour-intensive sectors impacted by global trade disruptions. Revenue expenditure, subsidies and non-essential spending are likely to remain tightly controlled, reinforcing the capex-led growth model.

title: A chilling deja Vu: When Ajit Pawar spoke of mid-air scare in Gadchiroli
content: Recalling a harrowing mid-air experience during a flight to Gadchiroli in July 2024, Ajit Pawar described chanting Lord Pandurang's name amidst near-zero visibility due to heavy rain and fog. He recounted how then deputy chief minister Devendra Fadnavis remained calm, reassuring him of his safety, an anecdote now tinged with sadness following Pawar's tragic death.

title: Shocking! 'Not feeling respected': Yuvraj reveals why he left cricket
content: Yuvraj Singh revealed that he retired from cricket in 2019 because he stopped enjoying the game and felt a lack of respect and support. Speaking on a podcast, he said he had nothing left to prove mentally or physically. Yuvraj also recalled early doubts about his talent but said he no longer takes them personally.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations today - check list
content: Top stock market recommendations: According to Aakash K Hindocha, Deputy Vice President - WM Research, Nuvama Professional Clients Group, the top buy calls for today are: Coal India, Jindal Steel, and HCL Technologies. Here’s his view on Nifty, Bank Nifty, and the top stock picks for January 29, 2026:

title: State mourning after Ajit Pawar dies in plane crash: Are banks in Maharashtra closed today?
content: Maharashtra is mourning Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar's passing in a plane crash with three days of state mourning. Banks are not officially closed due to this.

title: India-EU FTA: Will Turkish goods enter India under the newly signed trade deal?
content: Turkiye cannot leverage tariff concessions under the new India-EU free trade agreement for its exports to India. Officials clarified that the pact strictly applies to goods originating within the EU, meaning Turkish products, even if shipped via EU ports, do not qualify for preferential treatment.

title: Time stops at 8.44am in Baramati, Pawars’ hometown unites in time of grief to salute Dada
content: Baramati mourns the tragic loss of its beloved leader, Ajit Pawar, who died in a plane crash. The town, known for its unwavering support for the Pawar family, came to a standstill as residents expressed profound grief. Ajit Pawar's dedication to his constituency and his people was evident in the outpouring of sorrow and tributes.

title: Will Budget 2026 provide clarity on cryptocurrency taxation, simplify compliance?
content: India's booming crypto market, awaits clarity in Union Budget 2026. Following stringent measures in Budget 2025, including a 30% flat tax and 1% TDS, experts urge for nuanced rules on loss set-offs and asset classification. While some anticipate reforms, others foresee continued aggressive taxation, emphasizing compliance.

title: Here's why Kim Kardashian removed Meghan and Harry's pic
content: Kim Kardashian took a moment to explain the absence of Meghan and Harry's photos from social media following Kris Jenner's big 70th celebration. Instead of dramatic speculation, the truth is rooted in respect for Remembrance Day.

title: Travis Kelce supports Taylor Swift amid legal troubles as wedding plans pause
content: Travis Kelce has become a steady source of support for Taylor Swift as she navigates emotional strain linked to ongoing legal troubles around her inner circle. While staying publicly silent, Swift has leaned on Kelce’s guidance to protect her peace, set boundaries, and address personal tensions directly, even as wedding plans remain on pause.

title: Hockey analyst says Maple Leafs unofficially eliminated after losing streak
content: The Toronto Maple Leafs face a grim playoff outlook after a significant loss to the Buffalo Sabres. The team is now eight points behind wild card positions. With only 29 games remaining, hockey analyst Jason Gregor suggests the season is effectively over for Toronto. General Manager Brad Treliving must now decide the team's direction before the trade deadline.

title: Jarren Duran’s Boston role in doubt as Red Sox eye Astros’ $6.6m star
content: Jarren Duran’s role with the Boston Red Sox is uncertain as the team explores a possible trade for Houston Astros infielder Isaac Paredes before the 2026 season. Reports say a return deal could take shape during spring training. Boston also keeps an eye on shortstop C.J. Abrams as another potential roster move in the offseason trade market.

title: ‘Not an act of war’: Marco Rubio defends Venezuela operation at Senate hearing — what he said
content: Secretary of State Marco Rubio clarified the Trump administration's stance on Venezuela, stating military actions were not an act of war and no further intervention is planned. He also addressed Iran, emphasizing a defensive posture despite increased military presence, and noted the complexity of potential regime change. Discussions also covered Ukraine and Cuba.

title: Ummah or Dollars: Pakistan’s high stakes dilemma amid US-Iran conflict - explained
content: Pakistan faces a perilous tightrope walk as US-Iran tensions escalate.  Caught between seeking vital US dollars for its economy and appeasing domestic Islamic sentiment, Islamabad is leveraging its unique diplomatic position.  The nation's history of strategic ambiguity and its proximity to Iran present both opportunities and immense risks, potentially drawing it into a dangerous regional conflict.

title: 'I love Justin…': Madison Beer clarifies it’s Bieber, not Justin Herbert, she’s obsessed with
content: Madison Beer revealed she was obsessed with Justin Bieber at age 12, even keeping a cardboard cutout of him in her room. Years later, that fandom turned into a career-defining moment when Bieber shared her singing video and helped launch her music journey. Beer says the experience felt surreal and continues to shape how she views her path to stardom.

title: Nicki Minaj calls herself Trump's 'No. 1 fan'
content: Rapper Nicki Minaj has publicly declared herself President Trump's "No. 1 fan," vowing to support him despite criticism.  Trump, in turn, lauded Minaj as "the greatest" and announced a new savings initiative for children, with Minaj reportedly investing significantly. This program aims to provide financial support for young Americans' futures.

title: 'Border 2' box office, day 7: Sunny Deol, Varun Dhawan, Ahan Shetty film eyes Rs 300 cr worldwide
content: The patriotic drama 'Border 2' is dominating the box office, nearing Rs 300 crore globally. After a stellar opening, the film has amassed over Rs 213 crore net in India within six days.  Despite a weekday dip, its powerful narrative and action sequences continue to draw audiences, promising further milestones.

title: Bangladesh says 'no security risks'; clears shooting team for India travel
content: Bangladesh's shooting team has been cleared to compete in the Asian Rifle and Pistol Championships in India, despite the nation recently citing security concerns to withdraw its cricket team from the T20 World Cup. The government believes the indoor shooting event poses no significant security risks. The championship is scheduled from February 2 to 14 in New Delhi.

title: Baramati plane crash: Wristwatch, sitting position help cops identify Ajit Pawar’s body
content: Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar's body was identified after a Learjet 45 aircraft crashed near Baramati. Police used his wristwatch and familiar seating position to confirm his identity. The aircraft departed Mumbai and was on final approach to Baramati when the incident occurred. Pilots reported runway visibility issues before the crash.

title: Once accusing PCB of unpaid dues, ex-Pak head coach joins new PSL side
content: Jason Gillespie has been appointed head coach of the new Hyderabad franchise in the PSL, marking his return to Pakistan cricket after resigning as national Test coach in 2024. His appointment comes amid a dispute with the PCB over unpaid dues, which the board has denied. Gillespie had earlier cited poor communication and management decisions as reasons for his resignation.

title: Serena Williams admits mom guilt as she’s softer on Adira than Olympia
content: Serena Williams told Today with Jenna & Sheinelle on January 28, 2026, that she sometimes feels “too nice” to her youngest daughter Adira. The tennis icon admitted she has to check herself to stay fair with Olympia. The moment showed a softer, honest side of Serena as a mother.

title: Small passenger plane crashes in northeast Colombia, killing all 15 people on board
content: A small passenger plane carrying 15 people crashed in Colombia's Norte de Santander province on Wednesday, resulting in no survivors. The aircraft, operated by state-owned Satena, lost contact with air traffic control shortly after departing from Cúcuta. Local officials discovered the crash site in the village of Curasica.

title: AAP calls for discussion during Budget session on ‘failed’ foreign policy
content: AAP demanded a discussion on the issue during the Budget session of the Parliament, as well as on air pollution and the Aravallis

title: Tension prevails in village in Odisha’s Nabarangpur over demand to shift church
content: Villagers from Hindu community said that church was obstructing in practicing their own religious ceremonies

title: Tiger enters eco-sensitive zone of Papikondalu National Park
content: According to information, the tiger’s final pugmarks  were found indicating that the tiger had retreated deep into its natural habitat

title: Express appreciation to the U.S. in addressing long-standing issue of Gaza conflict: India
content: India further noted that while there have been incremental improvements in the humanitarian situation in Gaza, the harsh winter and scale of destruction continue to make the task difficult

title: Medaram Maha Jatara begins with Saralamma’s arrival close to midnight
content: The festival is set to reach its peak on January 29th night, when Mother Sammakka is scheduled to arrive from Chilakalagutta in the form of a vermilion casket

title: Parliament Budget Session 2026 LIVE: Economic Survey of India to be presented today
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will table the Economic Survey in Parliament on Thursday (January 29, 2026) and present the Union Budget on Sunday (February 1, 2026)

title: In Bihar, BIADA allots 12.5 acres of land to 25 industrial units
content: Decision will accelerate the pace of industrial expansion. Approved proposals to attract a cumulative investment of ₹168.52 crore which will also generate 1194 direct employment opportunities

title: District Emergency Response Facility-cum-Training Centre building to be built up in 20 districts in Bihar
content: At present State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) teams have been deployed in its own headquarters’ buildings in 17 districts while the work is currently underway in Patna district

title: Economic Survey 2026 LIVE: Nirmala Sitharaman to table official report card in Parliament today
content: The Economic Survey is an official report card on the government’s financial performance and the state of the economy during the year ending March 31

title: Kerala Budget 2026 LIVE: Finance Minister Balagopal presents State Budget; ₹14,500 crore for social security pensions; honorariums of ASHAs hiked
content: This Budget constitutes the final one of the present LDF government as Kerala is scheduled to have the Assembly elections in a few months' time

title: Can the ED file writ petitions before Courts? | Explained
content: What high-profile case is at the centre of the challenge against the Enforcement Directorate’s jurisdiction? What has been the Kerala government’s defence? Why is the outcome of this case significant for the balance of power between Central and State authorities in India?

title: Kerala Finance Minister to present State Budget today; key announcements anticipated ahead of Assembly polls
content: The Budget, final one of current CPI(M)-led LDF government, is being keenly watched for surprise announcements with Kerala expecting Assembly polls in a few months

title: Chottanikkara girl’s death: police yet to confirm Korean friend link
content: A post-mortem examination, according to police sources, confirmed drowning as the reason for her death

title: Accused in murder case of gangster Goldy Brar’s cousin shot dead in Punjab’s Mohali; Brar booked
content: Mohali police booked foreign-based gangster Goldy Brar for the murder of Gurwinder Singh alias Lambbad, who was shot dead outside a court where he had come for an opium case hearing

title: Goyal hits out at Congress for raising concerns over India-EU FTA
content: “I only hope my friend will shed this negative and pessimistic approach, which is unable to see our aspirational people raring to go out and do business with the world,” Mr. Goyal said

title: Gurugram schools receive bomb threats, declared hoax after search
content: The hoax mail’s origin has been traced to U.S. even as over a thousand of police personnel, five bomb detection and security officials conducted extensive searches Wednesday

title: Ajit Pawar's death in plane crash an accident, don't bring politics: Sharad Pawar
content: Mamata Banerjee has demanded a Supreme Court-monitored probe into the death of Ajit Pawar, alleging that “all other agencies” have been “completely compromised”

title: NDA will ruin developed State of T.N., if voted to power: Stalin
content: The CM accuses the AIADMK of betraying the interests of minorities by striking an alliance with the BJP. He announces an increase in pension and family pension for Ulemas and their families and an additional Waqf Tribunal in Coimbatore

title: Quenching Chennai’s growing thirst
content: The proposed sixth reservoir for Chennai near Thiruporur should be built by striking a balance between development and protecting livelihood issues of all stakeholders.

title: Ray J hospitalized with heart issues after years of partying and drinking
content: Rapper Ray J has revealed doctors warn his "time is limited" due to severe heart damage, functioning at only 25% capacity. He attributes this to years of heavy drinking and partying, leading to a recent hospitalization for pneumonia and heart pain. Despite travel warnings, he plans a trip to Haiti for treatment, hoping to survive.

title: Gauhati High Court lists PIL amid Assam vote row
content: The State unit of Trinamool Congress writes to the Chief Justice, seeking suo-motu cognisance of communal statements by public functionaries

title: CM calls for steps to expand Sanjeevani Project across A.P.
content: The initiative was launched as a pilot in Chittoor district to monitor health data, says Naidu and proposes task forces to create health awareness

title: AYUSHEXCIL, Zepto sign MoU to improve access and quality assurance for Ayush products
content: Union Ayush Minister, Prataprao Jadhav, stated that innovation-driven Indian startups are playing a critical role in improving last-mile access to trusted wellness products

title: Karnataka Opposition members express concern over quality of midday meals as supplier quotes below-market prices
content: BJP member B. Suresh Gowda alleged that the midday meals being served at the Karnataka Public School in his constituency of Tumakuru Rural was of inferior quality

title: Karnataka bars treatment of private in-patients by government doctors
content: The government noted that treatment of in-patients in private facilities involves longer clinical engagement, which may adversely affect the delivery of services in government hospitals

title: Baramati mourns its Ajit ‘Dada’
content: Political leaders, party workers and well-wishers express shock over Ajit Pawar’s sudden death; crowds throng Baramati to pay last respects to NCP leader

title: Kept my promise of returning land at Singur says Mamata
content: Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee addressed a public meeting at Singur nine days after Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed a public meeting at Singur

title: Wild animal attacks claim 685 human lives in Tamil Nadu in 10 years
content: The conflict situation is a cause of serious concern in Western Ghats districts such as Kanniyakumari, Tirunelveli, Virudhunagar, Madurai, Theni, Dindigul, Coimbatore and the Nilgiris and in three Eastern Ghats districts — Erode, Krishnagiri and Dharmapuri

title: Family of three, including child, murdered in Taramani; bodies dumped in different places
content: Father’s body was found in a sack, child’s body recovered from Buckingham Canal. The family had come searching for work from Bihar; the arrested are also from Bihar, Chennai police said.

title: Petitioners ask Supreme Court whether Election Commission gave data to show SIR was needed
content: Pleas against SIR say people from marginalised communities depend on their status as a voter to exercise core civil rights and failure to provide a document causes a fear of ‘being thrown out as a foreigner’

title: Kerala Tourism and The Hindu Group to host ‘Kerala for All’ conclave on inclusive and accessible tourism
content: A two-day knowledge conclave on inclusive and accessible tourism will be held on January 31 and February 1 in Kochi; the conclave will be inaugurated by Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan

title: Watch | Ajit Pawar dies in Baramati plane crash; a look at his life in Maharashtra politics
content: Ajit Pawar’s Learjet 45 carrying Pawar and four others crash-landed while approaching Baramati airport, killing all on board.

title: Govt. take over  ₹18.75-crore loans of Wayanad landslide-hit families
content: Government will sanction funds from the Chief Minister’s Distress Relief Fund to take over 1,620 loan liabilities of 555 disaster-hit families.

title: Wings India 2026: Hunnu Air’s Embraer E195-E2 cynosure of eyes
content: An airline official said the features of the aircraft are its reduced fuel burn from its Pratt and Whitney 1900 engines and noise reduction

title: Kerala HC closes petitions that questioned confidentiality of State government’s agreement with Sprinklr
content: The U.S.-based data analytics firm and the Kerala govt. had entered a tie-up for managing COVID-related data

title: Centre demands apology from Opposition for protesting during President’s Address to House
content: Members of Congress and its allies raised slogans against the VB-G RAM G Act, demanding its rollback as soon as President Murmu began her address to a joint sitting of Parliament

title: Supreme Court says States ‘building castles in the air’ on stray dog sterilisation
content: States fail to comply with SC directions on fencing institutional areas, removing strays from roads and highways; no specific data on number of bites, sterilisation capacity in States’ “vague” affidavits, says SC

title: Wings India 2026: Focus on enhancing safety, passenger experience and resilience, says Civil Aviation Secretary
content: Hyderabad has emerged as a major aviation aerospace and MRO hub, supported by progressive policies, and strong industry participation, the official told Wings India 2026

title: Parents, students stage protest to save govt. school in Ballari district
content: The Hosa Yaragudi government school is the only public school available for children from poor families in the village, says AIDSO

title: 66% sanitation workers in Central govt from SC, ST, OBC groups: DoPT report
content: The report shows that among all Group A posts in Union Ministries and departments, 14.2% were held by SCs, 6.54% by STs, and 19.14% by OBCs; the report provides no data on EWS employees

title: India’s civil aviation sector offers vast growth opportunities: PM
content: Only a few countries have such large-scale development plans, offer policy stability and pursue technological ambition as India, Narendra Modi tells Wings India 2026 conference being held in Hyderabad

title: SHRC orders probe into alleged drug trafficking around Kaloor stadium
content: The investigating officers have been asked to submit separate reports to the State Human Rights Commission within a month

title: 25 out of 110 micro breweries’ licences given to ministers’ coteries: Harish Rao
content: The BRS leader accuses the ruling party of allotting 25 out 110 licenses to those recommended by bigwigs

title: Cabinet nod for 583-km RRTS for high-speed rail travel in Kerala
content: A formal letter will be sent to the Centre expressing the State’s interest in the project. The Cabinet has also tasked the Transport department with initiating the necessary consultations.

title: Case filed against woman for ‘blackmailing’ Kodur MLA
content: MLA’s mother files an extortion case against the woman who earlier levied sexual exploitation allegations on the JSP leader

title: ED attaches ₹1,885 crore in assets linked to Reliance Anil Ambani Group to recover ‘bank dues’
content: The ED has alleged fraudulent diversion of public money by various Reliance Anil Ambani group companies including RCom, RHFL, RCFL, Reliance Infrastructure, and Reliance Power Limited

title: Cash-for-jobs complaint in K.N. Nehru’s Municipal Administration department was sent to DVAC on November 1, Tamil Nadu government tells Madras High Court
content: Advocate General P.S. Raman says, the DVAC will summon for inquiry whomever its finds answerable to the allegations

title: ICAR-CTCRI commercialises purple taro variety
content: Noted for its purple-streaked flesh, this taro is agronomically valued for its yield potential of 1.5 to 2.0 kg per plant

title: Maiden session of new Kozhikode Corporation  Council sees long debates on key issues
content: Opposition councillors allege large-scale irregularities in the maintenance contract of the sewage treatment plant at Government Medical College Hospital; VACB probe sought

title: Probe ordered into livestreaming of tiff between doctors and BJP MLA in Udhampur
content: Several doctors object to theProbe ordered into livestreaming of tiff between doctors and BJP MLA in Udhampur, which evoked sharp reactions from netizens online; Deputy CM Surinder Choudhary warns of action against employees ‘ignoring elected representatives’

title: G-Spider, AI-equipped canal cleaning system, launched in Thiruvananthapuram
content: The robotic system was first deployed near the spot where sanitation worker N. Joy ventured into the canal for cleaning in 2024 and lost his life

title: LeBron tears up during Cavaliers' tribute video
content: LeBron James teared up during a timeout when the Cavs showed video highlights of him scoring 25 straight points during Game 5 of the 2007 Eastern Conference finals against the Pistons.

title: Chargers hire Western Michigan's O'Leary as DC
content: Western Michigan defensive coordinator Chris O'Leary, who was the Chargers' safeties coach in 2024, returns to Los Angeles to be the team's defensive coordinator.

title: Brady latest to slam Belichick Hall of Fame snub
content: Tom Brady joined the chorus of voices questioning Bill Belichick's snub from the Pro Football Hall of Fame, saying the voting committee's decision is "completely ridiculous."

title: Sources: Giannis preps for Bucks exit amid offers
content: The Knicks, Heat, Timberwolves and Warriors are among teams making offers for the Bucks' Giannis Antetokounmpo ahead of the trade deadline, sources told ESPN.

title: Pats list Maye as limited heading into LX practice...
content: Ahead of their first Super Bowl practice, the Patriots said QB Drake Maye wouldn't have been a full participant Wednesday because of his banged-up right shoulder.

title: Davis arrested in Miami after two-week search
content: Gervonta Davis was taken into custody Wednesday on an arrest warrant on charges of battery, false imprisonment and attempted kidnapping.

title: Alabama judge recuses himself from Bediako case
content: The judge in Alabama men's basketball player Charles Bediako's eligibility lawsuit against the NCAA has recused himself from the case.

title: Jason Williams' rookie jersey sells for $140K
content: Jason Williams' game-worn home white Sacramento Kings jersey from the lockout-shortened 1998-99 NBA season, Williams' rookie year, has sold privately for $140,000. It's the most spent on any Williams item.

content: Which teams have the players, draft picks and contracts to get a deal done for Giannis Antetokounmpo?

content: No. 1 and 2 were not up for debate. The rest? Fair game. See who made the cut based on performances so far.

title: Wetzel: Belichick's first-ballot bid was a no-brai...
content: The humiliation of snubbing Bill Belichick is on the committee and, in turn, on the Hall of Fame itself.

title: When football meets third grade curriculum: The rise of NFeLementary
content: Mary Crippen, a third grade educator based in Florida, built NFeLementary by expanding on a football-based curriculum her mother created decades earlier.

title: Steph Curry takes home award at Sundance Film Fest...
content: The four-time NBA champion added another honor to his lengthy résumé on Tuesday night, this time off the court.

title: Champions League talking points: Mourinho's master...
content: With all 36 Champions League teams in action simultaneously, Matchday 8 of the league phase delivered plenty of drama to cap a fun competition so far. ESPN FC's writers pick out their highs and lows of the tournament to this point.

content: And then there were four: Carlos Alcaraz, Jannik Sinner, Alexander Zverev and Novak Djokovic. Here's how each can win the Australian Open.

content: It's time for WWE Royal Rumble 2026! Check out how to watch the action from Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, on ESPN.

content: Here are the top NFL draft risers from the second day of Senior Bowl practices, including an FCS QB who is making a statement.

title: Silver Breaches 4 Lakh Mark, Gold Jumps To Record Rs 1.75 Lakh Per 10 Grams
content: Silver prices on Thursday breached the record Rs 4 lakh per kilogram mark in futures trade, while gold touched a lifetime high of Rs 1.8 lakh per 10 grams, riding on strong investor demand and record gains in the international markets.

title: Ajit Pawar's Funeral Procession Route Changed Due To Uncontrollable Crowd
content: The last rites of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister and NCP chief Ajit Pawar will be held in his political stronghold, Baramati, with full state honours.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Ajit Pawar: The Politician Who Didn't Pretend
content: Ajit Pawar bent over backwards to be in power; when there, he commandeered it to work for the public while helping his party, of course.

title: Musk's Tesla To Spend $20 Billion On Autonomous Vehicles, Humanoid Robots
content: Tesla plans to more than double capital spending to a record high of more than $20 billion this year - but little of it will go to its traditional business of selling electric vehicles to human drivers.

title: "Don't Engage With Agitators": ICE Officers Told After 2 Killed In Minnesota
content: Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers in Minnesota on Wednesday were directed to avoid engaging with "agitators" as they carry out President Donald Trump's immigration crackdown, according to internal guidance reviewed by Reuters.

title: "Oh S***": Last Words From Cockpit Of Ajit Pawar's Plane
content: Ajit Pawar and four others were killed after a plane carrying them crashed in Maharashtra's Baramati Wednesday morning.

title: Trump Weighs Iran Strikes To Inspire Fresh Protests: Reports
content: Trump is weighing options against Iran that include targeted strikes on security forces and leaders to inspire protesters, multiple sources said, even as Israeli and Arab officials said air power alone would not topple the clerical rulers.

title: Trump's Indian-Origin Cyber Chief Uploaded Critical Files On ChatGPT: Report
content: The interim head of America's cyber defence agency, the very agency tasked with protecting the government's secrets, uploaded sensitive contracting documents into a public version of ChatGPT after taking charge of the agency last summer.

title: Ajit Pawar's Plane May Have Missed Satellite Safety Gear By Just 28 Days
content: The crash of the chartered aircraft carrying Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar has raised concerns about whether the plane narrowly missed being fitted with a satellite-based safety system that could have significantly aided its approach.

title: 'Trade Above Ukraine': Team Trump Blasts Europe Over India-EU Deal
content: Bessent accused European countries of indirectly financing the conflict they publicly condemn. After Russia invaded Ukraine and the imposition of Western sanctions, India significantly increased its purchases of discounted Russian crude oil.

title: Video: Avalanche Hits Kishtwar Amid Heavy Snowfall, 2nd This Week In J&K
content: According to initial reports, the avalanche came down from the upper reaches amid heavy snowfall, burying grazing areas and seasonal shelters in the region.

content: In an exhaustive interview with NDTV, drone pilots and operators from Ukraine's Signum Batallion go into details about drone warfare and what happens on the frontlines.

title: Ajit Pawar's Last Rites To Be Performed In Baramati Today
content: The last rites of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister and NCP chief Ajit Pawar will be held on Thursday in his political stronghold, Baramati, with full state honours, following his tragic death in a plane crash.

title: PM Pitches For Investments In Fast-Growing Indian Civil Aviation Sector
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday sought investments in the country's fast-growing civil aviation sector, which has witnessed a "historical transformation" in the last decade.

title: Politics Over Ajit Pawar's Death Unfortunate, Should Avoid: Eknath Shinde
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde on Wednesday decried politics over the death of his cabinet colleague Ajit Pawar and said the cause of the aircraft crash that killed the latter and four others was under investigation.

title: After Techie's Death, Noida Identifies 65 Risk Spots, Sets Deadlines
content: Around 65 vulnerable points, both major and minor, have been identified across Noida, with 52 of them falling under the Noida Authority's jurisdiction and slated for urgent corrective action, officials said.

title: Pilot Shambhavi Pathak's Last Message To Grandmother Before Baramati Crash
content: On Wednesday morning at 8:45 am, a plane crashed at Baramati Airport in Maharashtra. Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, along with four others, lost their lives in the accident.

content: The SC-ST Special Court in Jaipur has framed charges against former Rajasthan MLA Girraj Singh Malinga under multiple sections of the Indian Penal Code and the SC-ST Act, including attempt to murder.

title: No need for physical Aadhaar copies as new app enables digital verification
content: new app will let people manage and verify their identities digitally . details will be stored securely on mobile devices, eliminating the need to submit physical copies of Aadhaar for verification . changes to addresses and mobile numbers can also now be made in minutes .

title: In its R-Day video, IAF shows Pak N-site being bombed alongside Rafale ‘Enforcer’ image
content: the question has returned after the air force put out a video showing the Pakistani nuclear base getting hit . the video also shows images of Nur Khan base and other Pakistani military assets being hit during Operation Sindoor . a Swiss report recently said the Indian strikes forced Pakistan into appealing for peace .
